name: Bootstraped-multi-test-results-report
tagline: The project offers the possibility to build test reports using a bootstrap components, offering rendering support on a wide range of devices.
body: # bootstraped-multi-test-results-report [![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/BogdanLivadariu/bootstraped-multi-test-results-report](https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg)](https://gitter.im/BogdanLivadariu/bootstraped-multi-test-results-report?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge) The project offers the possibility to build test reports using a bootstrap components, offering rendering support on a wide range of devices. Once you have installed this plugin, and configured it with the proper location of your json test report files, after the build is finished, then the following menu will be present on your build/project and this will allow you to view reports as they are described in the readme from the following project: https://github.com/BogdanLivadariu/cucumber-reporting-handlebars
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
